headline: Ralph Lauren (RL): Assessing Valuation as Analyst Upgrades and Expansion Drive Fresh Growth Optimism
summary: Ralph Lauren (NYSE:RL) has caught renewed attention as analysts revise earnings estimates upward, pointing to strong expected gains. Consistent positive surprises and ongoing brand expansion are shaping its growth story for investors. See our latest analysis for Ralph Lauren. Ralph Lauren’s total shareholder return has been robust, with a 66.8% gain over the past year and 3.8% over five years, as momentum builds from consistent earnings beats and headline-making brand moves like the planned...
